actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-102.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #103 (212-180).

official_title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Committees.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-102) Authorizes the expenditure of funds not to exceed $525,000 for investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Committees. Declares that no part of such funds shall be available for expenditure in connection with the study of any subject which is being investigated by any other House committee. Terminates the authorization granted by this resolution on January 3, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Committees.
